item.title: About
item.description: This is a living archive for the [x] Seize the Night [x] (StN) guild from Neopets. Circa 2001. Seize the Night (StN) was originally a nameless collective on Neopets. I (soulwolf) started creating threads with the title “[x] Lupe Role Play [x]” in the “Evil Things and Monster Sightings” neoboard. (There was no Roleplay neoboard category.) When Neopets introduced guilds, there was enough interest that I decided to create one. I picked the name “Seize the Night” based on the 1998 Dean Koontz novel of the same name.

item.title: Join
